com.iland.core.web.rest.api

Interface VdcResource

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable

    @Path(value="/vdc")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
 @Consumes(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
public interface VdcResource
extends Serializable
    Vdc Resource Interface v1.
    Author:
    Cory Snyder

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CoreTask addVapp(String vdcUuid, VappSpec spec)
      Add a vApp from template to the given VDC.
      CoreTask createOrgVdcNetwork(String vdcUuid, OrgVdcNetworkSpec network)
      Create a new org-vdc network for this vDC.
      CoreTask deleteMetadata(String vdcUuid, String key)
      Delete a specific piece of metadata associated with a Vdc by its key.
      CoreTask deleteOrgVdcNetwork(String vdcUuid, String networkUuid)
      Deletes an org-vdc network.
      NameQueryResult doesVappNameExists(String vdcUuid, String vAppName)
      Check if the given vApp name exists within the given VDC.
      CoreTask editOrgVdcNetwork(String vdcUuid, String networkUuid, OrgVdcNetworkSpec network)
      Modifies an org-vdc network.
      VdcComputeCapacity extendResourcePools(String vdcUuid, VdcComputeCapacity vcc)
      Extend the memory and / or CPU resource pools for a given VDC as well as storage profile limits.
      List<VcdEdge> getEdgesForVdc(String vdcUuid)
      Get the edges for the VDC.
      void getEventHistoryCsvEmail(String vdcUuid, String email)
      Email a CSV report with all event history for a given Vdc.
      List<Media> getMedias(String vdcUuid)
      Get medias available to a given Vdc.
      List<Metadata> getMetadata(String vdcUuid)
      Retrieve metadata associated with a Vdc.
      List<OrgVdcNetwork> getOrgVdcNetworks(String vdcUuid)
      Get org vdc networks for a given VDC.
      List<StorageProfile> getStorageProfiles(String vdcUuid)
      Get the storage profiles available to the VDC.
      List<Vapp> getVappsForVdc(String vdcUuid)
      Get a list of vApps for a VDC.
      Bill getVdcBill(String vdcUuid, Integer month, Integer year)
      Gets a bill for a specified vDC.
      Vdc getVdcByUuid(String vdcUuid, Long timestamp)
      Get a VDC by its UUID.
      BillingSummary getVdcCurrentBilling(String vdcUuid)
      Get the current billing for a VDC.
      PerfSampleSerie getVdcPerfFor(String vdcUuid, String group, String name, String type, Long start, Long end, String interval, String limit)
      Get VDC performance data for the given VDC, counter, and time range.
      VdcResourceSummary getVdcSummary(String vdcUuid)
      Get the resource summary for the given VDC.
      List<Bill> getVdcVappBills(String vdcUuid, Integer month, Integer year)
      Gets all vapp bills for a specified vDC.
      List<Bill> getVdcVmBills(String vdcUuid, Integer month, Integer year)
      Gets all vm bills for a specified vDC.
      List<Vm> getVmsForVdc(String vdcUuid)
      Get a list of VMs for a VDC.
      CoreTask updateMetadata(String vdcUuid, List<Metadata> metadata)
      Add / update metadata associated with a Vdc.

    • Method Detail

      • getVdcByUuid

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{vdcUuid}")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
Vdc getVdcByUuid(@PathParam(value="vdcUuid")
                                                                                                              String vdcUuid,
                                                                                                              @QueryParam(value="timestamp")
                                                                                                              Long timestamp)
        Get a VDC by its UUID.
        Parameters:
        vdcUuid - vdc uuid
        timestamp - optional timestamp paramter to get the vDC details at a certain point in time.
        Returns:
        virtual data center

      • getVappsForVdc

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{vdcUuid}/vapps")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
List<Vapp> getVappsForVdc(@PathParam(value="vdcUuid")
                                                                                                                             String vdcUuid)
        Get a list of vApps for a VDC.
        Parameters:
        vdcUuid - vdc uuid
        Returns:
        list of vApps for the VDC

 @Path(value="/{vdcUuid}/billing/current")

      • getVdcBill

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{vdcUuid}/bill")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
Bill getVdcBill(@PathParam(value="vdcUuid")
                                                                                                                  String vdcUuid,
                                                                                                                  @QueryParam(value="month")
                                                                                                                  Integer month,
                                                                                                                  @QueryParam(value="year")
                                                                                                                  Integer year)
        Gets a bill for a specified vDC. Returns the current month bill by default, but query parameters can be used to select an earlier bill.
        Parameters:
        vdcUuid - vdc uuid
        Returns:
        bill for the specified vDC

      • getVdcVappBills

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{vdcUuid}/vapp-bills")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
List<Bill> getVdcVappBills(@PathParam(value="vdcUuid")
                                                                                                                                   String vdcUuid,
                                                                                                                                   @QueryParam(value="month")
                                                                                                                                   Integer month,
                                                                                                                                   @QueryParam(value="year")
                                                                                                                                   Integer year)
        Gets all vapp bills for a specified vDC. Returns the current month bills by default, but query parameters can be used to select an earlier set of bills.
        Parameters:
        vdcUuid - vdc uuid
        Returns:
        vapp bills for the specified vDC

      • updateMetadata

        @PUT
 @Path(value="/{vdcUuid}/metadata")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
 @Consumes(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
CoreTask updateMetadata(@PathParam(value="vdcUuid")
                                                                                                                                                                                           String vdcUuid,
                                                                                                                                                                                           List<Metadata> metadata)
        Add / update metadata associated with a Vdc.
        Parameters:
        vdcUuid - vdc uuid
        metadata - of instances
        Returns:
        asynchronous task details

      • addVapp

        @POST
 @Path(value="/{vdcUuid}/vapp")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
 @Consumes(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")

                                                                                                                                                                                 String vdcUuid,
                                                                                                                                                                                 VappSpec spec)

        Parameters:
        vdcUuid - vdc uuid
        spec - specification for the new vApp
        Returns:
        asynchronous task details

      • getVdcPerfFor

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{vdcUuid}/p")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
PerfSampleSerie getVdcPerfFor(@PathParam(value="vdcUuid")
                                                                                                                             String vdcUuid,
                                                                                                                             @QueryParam(value="group")
                                                                                                                             String group,
                                                                                                                             @QueryParam(value="name")
                                                                                                                             String name,
                                                                                                                             @QueryParam(value="type")
                                                                                                                             String type,
                                                                                                                             @QueryParam(value="start")
                                                                                                                             Long start,
                                                                                                                             @QueryParam(value="end")
                                                                                                                             Long end,
                                                                                                                             @QueryParam(value="interval")
                                                                                                                             String interval,
                                                                                                                             @QueryParam(value="limit")
                                                                                                                             String limit)
        Get VDC performance data for the given VDC, counter, and time range.
        Parameters:
        vdcUuid - vdc uuid
        group - perf counter group
        name - perf counter name
        type - perf counter type
        start - start date
        end - end date
        interval - interval
        limit - limit
        Returns:
        performance samples serie for the given vdc, counter and date range

      • getVdcSummary

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{vdcUuid}/summary")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
VdcResourceSummary getVdcSummary(@PathParam(value="vdcUuid")
                                                                                                                                      String vdcUuid)
        Get the resource summary for the given VDC.
        Parameters:
        vdcUuid - vdc uuid
        Returns:
        vdc resource summary

      • extendResourcePools

        @PUT
 @Path(value="/{vdcUuid}/compute-capacity")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
 @Consumes(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
VdcComputeCapacity extendResourcePools(@PathParam(value="vdcUuid")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  String vdcUuid,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  VdcComputeCapacity vcc)
        Extend the memory and / or CPU resource pools for a given VDC as well as storage profile limits.

      • createOrgVdcNetwork

        @POST
 @Path(value="/{vdcUuid}/networks")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
 @Consumes(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
CoreTask createOrgVdcNetwork(@PathParam(value="vdcUuid")
                                                                                                                                                                                                 String vdcUuid,
                                                                                                                                                                                                 OrgVdcNetworkSpec network)
        Create a new org-vdc network for this vDC.
        Parameters:
        vdcUuid - vdc uuid
        network - the new org vdc network
        Returns:
        new network

      • editOrgVdcNetwork

        @PUT
 @Path(value="/{vdcUuid}/network/{networkUuid}")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
 @Consumes(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
CoreTask editOrgVdcNetwork(@PathParam(value="vdcUuid")
                                                                                                                                                                                                           String vdcUuid,
                                                                                                                                                                                                           @PathParam(value="networkUuid")
                                                                                                                                                                                                           String networkUuid,
                                                                                                                                                                                                           OrgVdcNetworkSpec network)
        Modifies an org-vdc network.
        Parameters:
        vdcUuid - vdc uuid
        networkUuid - the uuid of the org-vdc network
        network - modified network details

      • deleteOrgVdcNetwork

        @DELETE
 @Path(value="/{vdcUuid}/network/{networkUuid}")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
CoreTask deleteOrgVdcNetwork(@PathParam(value="vdcUuid")
                                                                                                                                                   String vdcUuid,
                                                                                                                                                   @PathParam(value="networkUuid")
                                                                                                                                                   String networkUuid)
        Deletes an org-vdc network.
        Parameters:
        vdcUuid - vdc uuid
        networkUuid - the uuid of the org-vdc network to delete
        Returns:
        core task

      • doesVappNameExists

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{vdcUuid}/vapp-name-exists")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
NameQueryResult doesVappNameExists(@PathParam(value="vdcUuid")
                                                                                                                                                 String vdcUuid,
                                                                                                                                                 @QueryParam(value="name")
                                                                                                                                                 String vAppName)
        Check if the given vApp name exists within the given VDC.
        Parameters:
        vdcUuid - String vdc uuid
        vAppName - String vapp name to check the existence of
        Returns:
        name query result detailing whether queried name is taken as well as the other taken names

      • getEdgesForVdc

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{vdcUuid}/edges")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
List<VcdEdge> getEdgesForVdc(@PathParam(value="vdcUuid")
                                                                                                                                String vdcUuid)
        Get the edges for the VDC.
        Parameters:
        vdcUuid - vdc uuid
        Returns:
        a list of vcd edges
